text: Kielen Marcel Adams (born 11 May 2001) is an English professional footballer who plays as a striker. ==Career== After playing youth football for Oldham Athletic and Bradford City, Adams returned to Oldham in July 2019. In January 2020 he joined Chorley on loan. He was released by Oldham at the end of the 2019–20 season. ==References== Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Oldham Athletic A.F.C. players Category:Bradford City A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Chorley F.C. players
title: Kielen Adams
